projects.title: Mechanistic Overload Permitting for Flexible Airfield Pavements via Damage Factors
projects.shortTitle: ME Overload Permitting for Airfield Pavements
projects.excerpt: This ACRP-sponsored project aimed to suplement the existing ACR-PCR 5%-10% rule by developing a preliminary mechanistic framework where incremental structural damage cause by overload departures could be translated into a reliable allowance policy. .

projects.title: Impact of Commercial Electric Vehicles on Flexible Pavement Performance
projects.shortTitle: Impact of HDEVs on Flexible Pavements
projects.excerpt: This IDOT project aimed to assess the impact of heavy-duty electric trucks on flexible pavements, focusing on the effect of higher wheel torque levels delivered by electric engines. Potential changes in IDOT pavement design guidelines were recommended.

projects.title: Building MLâ€‘Based Prediction Models for Computationally Efficient Airfield Pavement Analysis
projects.excerpt: This FAA project focused on combining field and synthetic data to develop and calibrate generalized prediction models for airfield pavement analysis, using advanced FEM modeling and physics-informed Machine Learning algorithms.

projects.title: Impact of Dynamic Wheel Loading on Pavement Responses for Non-Free-Rolling Conditions
projects.shortTitle: Impact of DWL on Flexible Pavements
projects.excerpt: MS Thesis project. Building on the work carried out by former ICT researchers, a reviewed framework to incoporate roughness-induced Dynamic Wheel Loading on pavement analysis was developed.
